context: Hi. Can you reccomend an action movie?
Hi! How are you? Do you like The Avengers (2012) ? There is a new one out right now.
Yes. I really liked The Avengers (2012)
It is Avengers: Infinity War (2018) . I heard it is awesome.
I saw it a couple of weeks ago it was very good!
I really loved Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) and the sequel Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) , Those are great movies, and they are funny too. My favorite classic is Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981) .
resp: I enjoyed Thor: Ragnarok (2017) too that was very funny.
